tool_description: Analyzes execution quality by comparing actual fills against market conditions, calculating market impact and timing costs.

fills_data.description: JSON string containing fill execution data

market_data.description: JSON string containing relevant market data during execution

benchmark_type.description: Benchmark for comparison (arrival_price, close_price, vwap, twap)

error_messages: Invalid fills data: fills_data must be valid JSON with required fields
Invalid market data: market_data must be valid JSON with price and volume information
Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_minutes must be positive integer
Invalid benchmark type: benchmark_type must be one of (arrival_price, close_price, vwap, twap)
Insufficient market data: Not enough market data for specified analysis period
usage: Provide fills_data and market_data as JSON strings. Set analysis_period_minutes and benchmark_type for customized quality analysis.

market_impact_bps.description: Estimated market impact in basis points

timing_cost_bps.description: Timing cost relative to benchmark in basis points

price_improvement_bps.description: Price improvement vs benchmark in basis points

quality_grade.description: Letter grade for execution quality (A, B, C, D, F)
